title: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
description: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Preview.
2. Navigate to a series with no data.
3. Expected behavior: A friendly error message should be displayed.
